languages.text: "Авель..." {n}Паскаль обращает взгляд к последнему своему выжившему техносоратнику.{/n} "Наш тихий гений. Гениальный фантазер в клетке, абстракционист кода. Его талант завершил Коллектив, сделал его полным".

"Abel..." {n}Pasqal turns his gaze toward his last surviving tech-comrade.{/n} "Our quiet genius. The caged genius of imagination. The abstract artist of code. His talent completed the Collective and made it a whole."
languages.original_text: "Авель..." {n}Паскаль обращает взгляд к последнему своему выжившему техносоратнику.{/n} "Наш тихий гений. Гениальный фантазер в клетке, абстракционист кода. Его талант завершил Коллектив, сделал его полным".

traits.locale_text: "Abel..." {n}Pasqal turns his gaze toward his last surviving tech-brother.{/n} "Our quiet genius. The caged genius of imagination. The abstract artist of code. His talent completed the Collective and made it a whole."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「アベルは…」{n}パスカルは技術同胞最後の生き残りに視線を向ける。{/n}「静かな天才だ。囚われの、想像の天才。コードの抽象芸術家。その才能が集合体を完成させ、完全なものとした」
languages.original_text: "Abel..." {n}Pasqal turns his gaze toward his last surviving tech-comrade.{/n} "Our quiet genius. The caged genius of imagination. The abstract artist of code. His talent completed the Collective and made it a whole."

traits.locale_text: 「アベルは…」{n}パスカルは技術同胞最後の生き残りに視線を向ける。{/n}「静かな天才だ。囚われの、想像の天才。コードの抽象芸術家。その才能が集合体を完成させ、完全なものとした」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “亚伯……”{n}帕斯卡望向他最后一位幸存的技术伙伴。{/n}“他是我们安静的天才，是被禁锢的想象，是代码方面的抽象派艺术家。正是他的才华，帮助我们完善了这个聚合意识，使它成为一个整体。”
languages.original_text: "Abel..." {n}Pasqal turns his gaze toward his last surviving tech-comrade.{/n} "Our quiet genius. The caged genius of imagination. The abstract artist of code. His talent completed the Collective and made it a whole."

traits.locale_text: “亚伯……”{n}帕斯卡望向他最后一位幸存的技术伙伴。{/n}“他是我们安静的天才，是被禁锢的想象，是代码方面的抽象派艺术家。正是他的才华，帮助我们完善了这个聚合意识，使它成为一个整体。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Quant à Abel, » {n}poursuit Pasqal en se tournant vers le dernier de ses technoconfrères encore en vie.{/n} « C'était notre génie. Le génie de l'imagination. L'artiste abstrait du code. Ses talents sont venus parachever le collectif. Avec lui, nous étions au complet. »
languages.original_text: "Abel..." {n}Pasqal turns his gaze toward his last surviving tech-comrade.{/n} "Our quiet genius. The caged genius of imagination. The abstract artist of code. His talent completed the Collective and made it a whole."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à Abel, » {n}poursuit Pasqal en se tournant vers le dernier de ses technoconfrères encore en vie.{/n} « C'était notre génie. Le génie de l'imagination. L'artiste abstrait du code. Ses talents sont venus parachever le collectif. Avec lui, nous étions au complet. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Abel...». {n}Pasqal dirige la mirada hacia su último tecnocamarada vivo.{/n} «Nuestro reservado genio. El enjaulado genio de la imaginación. El artista abstracto del código. Su talento completó el Colectivo y lo hizo íntegro».
languages.original_text: "Abel..." {n}Pasqal turns his gaze toward his last surviving tech-comrade.{/n} "Our quiet genius. The caged genius of imagination. The abstract artist of code. His talent completed the Collective and made it a whole."

traits.locale_text: «Abel...». {n}Pasqal dirige la mirada hacia su último tecnocamarada vivo.{/n} «Nuestro reservado genio. El enjaulado genio de la imaginación. El artista abstracto del código. Su talento completó el Colectivo y lo hizo íntegro».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Abel ..." {n}Pasqal richtet seinen Blick auf seinen letzten überlebenden Techkameraden.{/n} "Unser stilles Genie. Das eingesperrte Genie der Vorstellungskraft. Der abstrakte Künstler des Codes. Sein Talent hat das Kollektiv vervollständigt und zu einem Ganzen werden lassen."
languages.original_text: "Abel..." {n}Pasqal turns his gaze toward his last surviving tech-comrade.{/n} "Our quiet genius. The caged genius of imagination. The abstract artist of code. His talent completed the Collective and made it a whole."

traits.locale_text: "Abel ..." {n}Pasqal richtet seinen Blick auf seinen letzten überlebenden Techkameraden.{/n} "Unser stilles Genie. Das eingesperrte Genie der Vorstellungskraft. Der abstrakte Künstler des Codes. Sein Talent hat das Kollektiv vervollständigt und zu einem Ganzen werden lassen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Abel..." {n}Pasqal, bakışlarını son kalan tekno yoldaşına çeviriyor.{/n} "Sessiz dehamız. Kafese tıkılmış, hayalci deha. Soyut kod sanatçısı. Bütünlük'ü tamamlayan onun kabiliyetiydi."
languages.original_text: "Abel..." {n}Pasqal turns his gaze toward his last surviving tech-comrade.{/n} "Our quiet genius. The caged genius of imagination. The abstract artist of code. His talent completed the Collective and made it a whole."

traits.locale_text: "Abel..." {n}Pasqal bakışlarını son kalan tekno yoldaşına çeviriyor.{/n} "Sessiz dehamız. Hayal gücünün kafesler içindeki dehası. Soyut kod sanatçısı. Bütünlük'ü tamamlayan onun kabiliyetiydi."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
